6.16.21  7:53 am   I have some question about, "Here Comes the Sun."

3. Why do I keep listening to it?

6.15.21  11:11 pm   I know you try to write the lyrics along with the melody and chords at the same time. But how often do you get too excited about the melody and chords and just keep going without the lyrics, mumbling or with words that sound kinda right but are to be changed later?

     The lyrics often have to catch up later for me, but what I'll do pretty often is say the words that feel right, and then replace occasional lines and words later with better ones in one way or another. Does that ever happen with your writing?
